body:
Comment 3: 
Go fails on RHEL 4, which dates from 2005.

If someone else wants to fix it and send us a patch, that would be great,
but we - the core Go team - don't have the bandwidth to support old systems.  
We don't even support OS X 10.5 anymore, and that's significantly newer.

The workaround is to use RHEL 5 or later.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
